Title: Enacts the "Learning for Work" act; appropriation
Summary: Enacts the "learning for work act"; establishes the youth apprenticeship program and the enhanced regents professional diploma; appropriates moneys therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 23-C §§832 - 832-d, Lab L; add §208-b, Ed L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing the youth apprenticeship program; and making an appropriation therefor (Part A); to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the enhanced regents professional diploma (Part B); and to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a youth apprenticeship tax credit (Part C)
